title: Newtons second law - net force graph from a

content.question: At time <math alttext="t equals 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>, a car is traveling on a straight, level road and the driver begins to apply the brakes. The car slows down and eventually stops at time <math alttext="t sub s" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>t</mi><mi>s</mi></msub></math>. The magnitude of the acceleration of the car as a function of time is equal to <math alttext="C t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>C</mi><mi>t</mi></math>, where <math alttext="C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>C</mi></math> is a positive constant. Which of the following graphs could represent the magnitude <math alttext="F sub net" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>F</mi><mi>net</mi></msub></math> of the net force on the car as a function of time?

choices.label: The figure shows the graph of a line segment in the first quadrant of a coordinate plane, with the origin labeled O. The horizontal axis is labeled t, and the value t sub s is indicated near the end of the axis. The vertical axis is labeled F sub net. The line segment begins on the vertical axis, above the origin, and slants downward and to the right until it ends on the horizontal axis at t sub s.

The figure shows the graph of a line segment in the first quadrant of a coordinate plane, with the origin labeled O. The horizontal axis is labeled t, and the value t sub s is indicated near the end of the axis. The vertical axis is labeled F sub net. The line segment begins on the vertical axis, above the origin, and moves horizontally to the right until it ends above t sub s.

The figure shows the graph of a line segment in the first quadrant of a coordinate plane, with the origin labeled O. The horizontal axis is labeled t, and the value t sub s is indicated near the end of the axis. The vertical axis is labeled F sub net. The line segment begins at the origin, and slants upward and to the right until it ends high above t sub s.

The figure shows the graph of a line segment in the first quadrant of a coordinate plane, with the origin labeled O. The horizontal axis is labeled t, and the value t sub s is indicated near the end of the axis. The vertical axis is labeled F sub net. The line segment begins on the vertical axis, above the origin, and slants upward and to the right until it ends above t sub s.

content.answer: The figure shows the graph of a line segment in the first quadrant of a coordinate plane, with the origin labeled O. The horizontal axis is labeled t, and the value t sub s is indicated near the end of the axis. The vertical axis is labeled F sub net. The line segment begins at the origin, and slants upward and to the right until it ends high above t sub s.

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
